alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 11:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington and west central Kane Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1110 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of St George, or 15 miles east of Virgin River Gorge, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zion National Park, St George, Washington, Hurricane, La Verkin, Quail Creek State Park, Sand Hollow State Park, Apple Valley, Toquerville, Leeds, Virgin, Springdale, Rockville and Bloomington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 30. Utah Route 18 near mile marker 0. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Zion National Park
